item.title: July 27, 2021 21:05
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: Got around setting up my music collection on the odroid-xu4 using Navidrome. With that streamlined, I can now listen to the same collection over any connected device and/or cache the songs for offline listening using dsub! Feels like a self-hosted Spotify!
